question: The aural learning style includes recordings, music, and rhythms
Working skills include (time management and communication)
A skilled person uses more time and resources to do the job and produces quality result
correction: A skilled person uses {{less}} time and resources to do the job and produces quality result

question: Learning skills include developing your memory
Hard skills are the qualifications required to do a job
Respecting diversity is considered a social skill

correction: Using memory techniques is one of the {{thinking}} skills

question: The PACT Learning Cycle has 7 stages
correction: The PACT Learning Cycle has {{4}} stages
